website_summaries.verdict: Expensive, but these uniquely designed glove deodorizers should give you plenty of longevity.
pros: Very sturdy design means they'll stand up to rough treatment well
Uses a thick rope to connect the 2 deodorizers together for good durability
Does a great job of removing all moisture from the interior of the gloves
cons: No extra scent is built into the pads

customer_reviews.title: Great for this beer leaguer
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beer league hockey player whose habits about airing out my gear after a game go back to when I played hockey as a kid-- when I just stuffed everything into the bag, zipped it up, and left it in the garage until the next game. My wife suggested I try these, and they work! I don't put them into my gloves, I put them into the whole bag and try to move them around once or twice before I skate again. The amount of stench they remove is really impressive. The company's customer service is also outstanding. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ross A. Bonander

customer_reviews.title: My daughter dances up to 15 hours/week and the smell ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter dances up to 15 hours/week and the smell that comes from her dance shoes nearly makes me pass out. We've tried everything we can think of to help with the smell, but nothing seems to work. Purchased one of these after seeing it on Shark Tank. We immediately put it in her ballet shoes, and to our amazement, the foot odor was gone within 24 hours! The shoes actually smelled brand new! We immediately purchased 2 more for her other dance shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Do no disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Two boys during Summer Travel Lacrosse and we were quickly looking for something to help with the smell! The GloveStixs did not disappoint. We got one for each boy and they love them. They are easy to use. When the boys take off their gloves they put the stixs in right away - also helps to make sure a glove isn't left behind. We had something already for their cleats, but when that wears out we will definitely be purchasing a set for them as well. Love that they have replaceable inserts, they are non-toxic and do not smell. We don't use artificial fragrances in our house so these are perfect for us!
customer_reviews.author: Wallflowermama

customer_reviews.title: Great Goalie Glove Odor Saver
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great on keeping my daughters new pair of gloves free from stink and funk and all the other smells associated with soccer goalie gloves. We did try and use them to clear up the smell in her older pair but I think they were too far gone for this product to help. Plan on probably 2 seasons of use before you have to buy the insert.
customer_reviews.author: O. Eric Norris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing results-- we were all dying a slow death on a daily basis when my 13 year old took his shoes off each day. This solved the problem after 2 days and we can't be happier that we have rid the Mudroom of that horrible stench!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy Shoes

customer_reviews.title: 100% as described
customer_reviews.text: This product worked as described. I had been using sprays to try to deodorize and clean the inside of my boxing gloves, but I could never get the inside dry nor could I get withing the curves or the thumb area. I was skeptical that these would work since the stix are so skinny and the gloves are so wide and curved. But, they do!!!! My gloves are now dry and have no odor, even when I use them on back-to-back days. I just insert the stix in the gloves at the end of my session and leave them in until the next.
customer_reviews.author: Daisydroplets

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for boxing gloves
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use on my boxing gloves and unfortunately they didn't work at all. There are much better products out there for a lot less money. They only give you a month to return the product so make sure you pay attention to that window incase you want to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny H. Levin

customer_reviews.title: This really works!!! Just make sure you ...
customer_reviews.text: This really works!!! Just make sure you have refills ready. My son’s soccer goalie gloves lasted an entire season thanks to this! No smell whatsoever, just make sure you make it a habit to place the GloveStix into the gloves immediately and don’t store them into any bag or backpack, instead leave them out to air. I’ll be purchasing more refills for future use for sure!
customer_reviews.author: QL

customer_reviews.title: Stinky no more
customer_reviews.text: The sticks work well for my boxing gloves. The best result was when I was able to keep them in for a longer period, but I had the gloves for awhile at this point. Ideally would use these right away with new athletic gear.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: Baseball Cleats Stink OUT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son made HS Varsity baseball team this year and on day1 of practice, which was muddy due to lots of rain prior, to say his cleats not only looked atrocious but the stink was 10xx worse...OMG!!!. I ordered GloveStixs and arrived the next day. Within 24 hours the odor was 1000 times better. My son now swears by this product and me too!!! First thing when he comes home from practice, he right away cleans his cleats and puts the Stixs back in. The product really WORKS!!!, and within 24 hours STINK nightmare pretty much GONE. Very HAPPY customer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Baseball Mom

customer_reviews.title: A breath of fresh air...
customer_reviews.text: I was browsing the internet during the holidays and stopped upon seeing your add to ponder when the wife walked by and I showed it to her. Her eyes lit up and said she was looking to buy that for our daughter. We both giggled while I ordered the GLOVESTIX. Funny that she didn't say much about her (err...our) gift, but she has been using them nightly and the smell is gone. Thank you for the magic stix - we will be ordering more soon. Best gift we got all year!
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother, they don’t work
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed with these. They didn’t work at all In my boxing gloves. The biggest waste of $30 I spent. If it’s seems too good to be true it is.
customer_reviews.author: Lolli

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm on my boxing gloves
customer_reviews.text: I saw many reviews for hockey and football gear, but was worried if the sticks would work well with my new Cleto Reyes gloves and they have been amazing. The gloves smell like new. I just do a quick wipedown of my gloves after training, and put the stinksticks in right after and they've done amazing. What a great product. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Leon

customer_reviews.title: They have made a big difference
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter. The whole family plays ice hockey. Yes, even her. I thought, what a great idea because their bags and equipment smell sooo bad! I haven’t seen them for a few months because they live in Alaska. Come to find out, they have been using these for awhile now in my goalie grandson’s bag. She said they have made a big difference and was thrilled to have another for my other grandson’s bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Takes out the STINK!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for our daughter's soccer cleats. She has a history of stinky cleats. Her new cleats were used for her high school senior year and were pretty smelly by the end of the season. We got the Glovestix because she's playing in college and didn't want her cleats to stink up her dorm room. I'm happy to say that she loves them. She let us know the Glovestix took out the stink.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I had stinky shoes before I bought this product. I had stinky shoes after buying this product.

customer_reviews.title: Glovestix are the Real Deal!  You Can't Go Wrong With These!
customer_reviews.text: I've had to throw shoes away because they would smell so bad. I practically filled my shoes with baking soda and that didn't work. After reading the reviews I decided to try these. When they came I put them right in my smelly shoes, WOW!!!! When I checked them in the morning I couldn't smell anything! You can't go wrong with these!

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with that concept so far.

customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Required Equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Glove Stix are a MUST if your child plays a sport that requires sweat. If you are a parent that has ever experienced the rancid funk that emanates from athletic shoes and gym bags... Or if you have ever seriously thought of kicking your kids out of the car on the way home after a game or practice.... You already know what I am talking about.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is really effective. My daughter is a figure skater and skates daily. This has neutralized the odor in my daughter's ice skates and ice skating bag.It's not overly fragrant with an artificial fresh scent, it just neutralizes the odor. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Glovestix Odor Eliminator – Deodorizer for Gloves, Shoes & Smelly Sports Equipment, As Seen on Shark Tank (1 Set of Sticks)
feature_bullets: ELIMINATES ODORS & BACTERIA: Silver Seal technology inhibits 99.9% of odor-causing bacteria over 24 hours for a 10 year period
ABSORBS MOISTURE: Contains replaceable deodorizing and moisture absorbing bags; Lightly scented with plant-based essential oils; Change every 3 months
NON-TOXIC: An all-natural, non-toxic and safe alternative to harsh chemical sprays
FIGHTS ODOR ANYWHERE: Perfect for new or used gear and hard to clean gloves, shoes, boots and cleats; Great for lacrosse, hockey, boxing, football, soccer gear and more
CONVENIENT FEATURES: Durable paracord handle lets you hang your gloves while in use; Removable clips designed to secure the wrist guards of gloves or shoelaces on shoes
